EndDate.description: The date of the last day a person is out of the office. After the message expires, it goes away automatically.

IsEnabled.description: Indicates whether an out-of-office message can be displayed for a user. The default value is true.

Message.description: The message portion of the out-of-office message. This text, along with start and end dates, is appended to the userâ€™s name in the Salesforce user interface. The maximum length of this string is 40 characters.

StartDate.description: The date of the first day a person is out of the office.

UserId.description: The ID of the user associated with the out-of-office message.
